definition: to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning

sentences.english: Don't tell me you are unworried.
Many a retired worker has hoped for a secure old age.
sentences.chinese: 许多退休职工都希望有一个无忧无虑的晚年。

sentences.english: I hoped the carefree young girl in the lotus flower station ugg short thought of to together smile.
sentences.chinese: 我望着荷花亭中无忧无虑的少女，想起了齐笑。

sentences.english: The deer lived there free from any anxieties.
As you can guess, I plan to keep this trip as stress-free as I can.
sentences.chinese: 正如你所想，我就打算让这次旅行尽量无忧无虑一些。

sentences.english: He is always so light-hearted, nothing ever seems to get him down.
sentences.chinese: 他总是那么无忧无虑，好像没有事情可以让他不开心。

sentences.english: He gads about without a care in the world.
sentences.chinese: 他无忧无虑地四处闲逛。

sentences.english: I hope my life is happy and unworried.
sentences.chinese: 希望我的生活也是无忧无虑的。

sentences.english: I gave up my care-free life and came to the culturally-reversed country.
sentences.chinese: 放弃无忧无虑的生活来到这个奇异文化的国度。

sentences.english: The sun was shining, and he felt light-hearted and careless.
sentences.chinese: 阳光灿灿，他觉得轻松愉快，无忧无虑。

sentences.english: Having a truly problem-free flying experience.
sentences.chinese: 有一次真正无忧无虑的飞行旅程。

sentences.english: Her birth, and carefree childhood in France.
sentences.chinese: 她在法国出生，以及无忧无虑的童年。

sentences.english: An Aquarian man displays a carefree attitude. However, he lacks passion.
sentences.chinese: 水瓶男无忧无虑却缺乏激情。
今晚她无忧无虑，很是高兴。

sentences.english: Tonight she was gay and anxiety-free.
sentences.chinese: 今晚她无忧无虑，很是高兴。

sentences.english: She daydreamed about a carefree vacation.
sentences.chinese: 她梦想那无忧无虑的假期。

definition: free and unconstrained (idiom); unfettered/unbuttoned/without care or worries
not having to worry about clothes and food (idiom)/to be provided with the basic necessities
to have no cares/to be carefree
How are you getting by?/How's life?/contraction of 過得去|过得去, can get by/tolerably well/not too bad
to find amusement in one's own way/to enjoy oneself quietly
